Key Match Events: Jack Grealish scored the opening goal for England
Trent Alexander-Arnold scored a free-kick to double England's lead
Declan Rice scored the third goal for England
Finland scored a late consolation goal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Helsinki Olympic Stadium
Others: England's win boosted their automatic promotion hopes from League B Group 2
Finland's defeat left them trailing on goal difference
The result saw England go level on points with Greece
